Test: Page marked noindex via HTTP headers
Notes: Blocks indexing even if meta tags allow indexing

Test: Page marked nofollow via meta or HTTP headers
Notes: Prevents link equity flow and crawling intent

Test: Conflicting index directives detected (meta vs headers)

Notes: Page may be treated as duplicate or ignored; not always needed
Search engines may ignore canonical entirely

Test: Canonical points to a different URL than the page
Canonical uses incorrect protocol (HTTP vs HTTPS)
Notes: HTTP canonical on HTTPS page is always wrong

Test: Canonical target contains tracking or session parameters

Notes: Common CMS/template error; HTML5 allows multiple H1s in sections

Test: H1 exists but is empty or whitespace-only
H1 is hidden or visually suppressed
Notes: Requires Playwright for rendered DOM analysis

Test: Title exceeds maximum recommended length (55 chars)
Title below minimum recommended length (30 chars)
Meta description exceeds maximum length (155 chars)
Meta description below minimum length (70 chars)

Notes: Default or broken social previews (no SEO impact)
Accessibility and localization issues (no SEO impact)

Test: HTML lang value invalid or malformed

Notes: Page not optimized for mobile devices

Test: Canonical or OG URLs use HTTP
No meaningful content present in initial HTML
Notes: Requires Playwright for rendered DOM analysis

Test: Primary content requires JavaScript to appear
Notes: Requires Playwright for rendered DOM analysis
Requires Playwright for rendered DOM analysis
Empty alt indicates incomplete content or accessibility issue
